abstract: Former friends of Joe Helt, man who disappeared at age 17 from Ellenville, NY, in 1987, have begun asking pointed questions about his case, reviving old tensions in quiet town; group is quick to note that three acquaintances who saw him last were never questioned as part of investigation.
snippet: Joe Helt was 17 years old when he disappeared in 1987, and some of his former classmates are asking questions again.
lead_paragraph: Joe Helt was 17 years old when he disappeared in 1987, and some of his former classmates are asking questions again.

headline.main: Tensions Persist Over a Man Long Missing
headline.print_headline: Tensions Persist Over a Man Long Missing
headline.seo: A Village’s Tensions Over a Man Missing for 24 Years
